    Yanzhi Tian

    School of Computer Science and Technology, Beijing Institute of Technology

    • Master student at Beijing Institute of Technology
    • Beijing, China
    • Email
    • Github
    • Google Scholar

    Yanzhi Tian (田炎智), is currently a master student at School of Computer Science and Technology, Beijing Institute of Technology(北京理工大学计算机学院). He received his bachelor’s degree from Elite class of XUTELI, Beijing Institute of Technology(北京理工大学徐特立英才班) in 2023, majoring in computer science.

    His research interests include Machine Translation and Vision Language Models.

    🔥 News

    • 2025.05:  🎉🎉 1 paper has been accepted by ACL 2025 Findings!

    In-Image Neural Machine Translation with Segmented Pixel Sequence-to-Sequence Model

    Yanzhi Tian, Xiang Li, Zeming Liu, Yuhang Guo, Bin Wang

    • We design an end-to-end model for IIMT that outperforms traditional cascade methods for the first time.
